articles.title: Predictive AI model
articles.Description: In this project, I developed a predictive model to analyze and optimize energy consumption patterns at electric vehicle (EV) charging stations, using real-world data from Arlanda Airport. The aim was to identify efficient energy usage trends that could support smarter energy distribution and reduce peak load costs.

articles.title: Exploring Joomla CMS vulnerabilities-JoomScan
articles.Description: Joomscan is a tool to scan joomla site and in this article described how can we use it
